1.content:
You have arrived at the mysterious nightclub known as The Naga's Coils. You are young and anxious to have a good time. You are also anxious to see and meet a real live naga, as the nightclub's name implies. You walk in and are greeted by a rather sexy waitress. She is not a naga, but she wears a dress that almost makes her look like a naga.

She smiles at you and says, "Hello, welcome to the Naga's Coils. What interests you?"
"I would like to meet a real live naga?" you humbly reply.
"I can arrange that, but first step into the light so I can see who you are?" she says. You step into the light and you are...
1.title: Who are you?

121.content:
"Ah, good choice sir. Cindy is always popular, but I should probably warn you that she has a bit of a dominating personality."

"Oh please... Naga or not, I've never met a girl that I couldn't handle! You don't need to worry about me, sweety." you say confidently.

The waitress simply giggles and walks away, leading you to the room where you would meet up with Cindy. She unlocked the door and allowed you to walk in before bowing her head and leaving. At this point, you heard a hissing sound from the other corner of the room. Looking over, you saw an incredibly sexy looking naga girl. She appeared to be around 19 years old, and had luscious D-cup breasts that you couldn't help but stare at. Her long blonde hair flowed luxuriously down her back, and her brown-scaled snake half seemed to go on forever. The best part was possibly the fact that she was wearing nothing but a skimpy bikini top, which was straining in its efforts to contain her plump breasts. You simply smiled and waved at the figure of serpentine perfection, blushing as you stared at her beautiful form.

"Well, hello there big boy. Are you here to be my new plaything?" Cindy asks in a seductive voice.

You just smiled and walked toward her.

"Sorry Miss, we'll be having a lot of fun together, but I'm going to be the one calling the shots tonight." you reply.

Hearing this, Cindy simply burst into laughter.

"What's so funny?!" you ask, somewhat irritated.

"You are! Do you have any idea where you are right now?"

"Yeah. 'The Naga's Coils', right?"

"Exactly! And now, you're about to be trapped by my coils!" Cindy says with a devious smirk on her face.

At that point, you look down to see that her long tail has you completely surrounded. You try to jump back, but her tail wraps around your ankle and pulls you down to the ground. Cindy then begins to wrap her tail around your entire body, tightly constricting you in her scaly coils. You try to struggle against her tail, but her snake-half's muscles are simply too strong for you to overcome. Soon your whole form is trapped within the coils of Cindy's powerful tail, with your head being the only part visible. You once again struggle to break free, but Cindy simply laughs before tightening her coils around you even further. You let out a groan of pain as Cindy effortlessly dominates you with her mighty tail.

Grinning ear to ear, Cindy now approaches you herself. She places her hand on your cheek and leans her face right in front of yours, her juicy lips mere inches away from your own. She then sticks out her forked tongue and slides it up your face, licking you from your chin to your forehead. She smirks playfully as she leans her head over next to your ear and exhales her warm moist breath right into it. She then whispers into your ear with a voice full of lust and dominance.

"So little cat, do you still think that you're the one calling the shots? Because from were I'm standing, it seems like I have you trapped pretty well. Struggle all you want, but they don't call me a boa constrictor for nothing. I'll tell you this right now; until I'm done having my fun with you... You. Aren't. Going. Anywhere."

Cindy then began to squeeze her coils around you even tighter, forcing the air out of your lungs with an incredible strength unlike anything you had ever seen before. Her tail was easily twice as strong as you were, probably even stronger, and there was nothing your inadequate muscles could do to allow you to escape from her. "I'm not much of a candy eater, Miss Coils," you reply.

"But don't you know that when a Naga offers you a gift you must accept it without question of you will face the consequences?" she asks, with a sinister undertone. Out of the corner of your eye you see that she is poising her tail go strike and wrap around you.

"Go on little dragon," she says thrusting the candy in your face. "Eat my candy."

What do you do?

info.brief_description: Come on down to the Naga's Coils.  Someone might have a "crush" on you.
info.description:
You are in the role of a given character that has come to a mysterious nightclub known as the Naga's Coils, hoping for a good time, and maybe to see and meet a real live naga. Be warned, you may get more than you bargained for. Here are some rules:

1. Scant clothing is good, but nudity is not.
2. If there must be sex, do not go into graphic detail.
3. F/M and F/F encounters are okay, but M/M encounters are not allowed.
4. Other than that enjoy!

Disclaimer: some of the given character are not mine, and I do not make any money from this.
